title: 'F*cking hell!' - Pep Guardiola hilariously invites reporter to become his assistant after being stunned by question in Man City press conference
desc: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola had a hilarious response after being grilled on tactics during a press conference ahead of his team's FA Cup fourth round tie against League Two side Salford City on Saturday. Guardiola, who is known for his tactical innovations, was left stunned by a reporter's insightful question and jokingly invited him to become part of his staff.
